title: Die Sabbathi, 11 Junii, 1642. It is this day ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that a strict search and examination shall be made by the justices of peace, maiors, bayliffs, constables, and other His Majesties officers, inhabiting, or neer adjoyning to all the Northern roads, for the stopping and staying of all arms, ammunition, powder, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott, and Iohn Wright,
notes: Order to be printed dated: Die Mercurii, 15 Junii, 1642., and signed: Jo. Brown, Cleric. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
